local LungeSound = Instance.new("Sound") LungeSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordlunge.wav" LungeSound.Parent = sword LungeSound.Volume = .6

function blow(hit) if not hit.Parent then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand --[[for index, child in pairs(vTorso:GetChildren()) do if child.Name == 'BodyVelocity' then child.Parent = nil end end]] --if vJumpForce then vJumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) lastHitTarget = humanoid --if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then -- lunge() --end wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
end
end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function attack() damage = slash_damage SlashSound:play() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function slamdown()
bothSwordsDown() wait(1.5) swordUp()
end

local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local players = game.Players:GetChildren() local maxDistance = 48 --local neareastDist = maxDistance --local nearestCharacter = nil if #players > 1 then for i = 1, #players do local currPlayer = players[i] if currPlayer ~= vPlayer then local tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then local tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso then local distance = (tempTorso.Position - vTorso.Position).magnitude --print('distance is' .. distance) if distance < maxDistance then --and distance < nearestDist then if distance > 10 then table.insert(attackList, tempChar)
--nearestDist = distance --neareastCharacter = tempChar --print('nearestPlayer is' .. neareastCharacter.Name) end end end end end end end
damage = lunge_damage
LungeSound:play()
local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Lunge" anim.Parent = Tool
if vJumpForce == nil then vJumpForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") vJumpForce.Parent = Tool.Parent.Torso
vJumpForce.Name = "JumpForce" end
print(#attackList .. 'enemies in the list') if attackList and #attackList > 0 then
for _, v in ipairs(attackList) do local nextVictim = v local nextVictimTorso = nextVictim:FindFirstChild("Torso") -- get the direction to the next target and normalize it to a velocity of 80 --print("lunging from " .. vTorso.Position .. " to " .. nextTorsoPosition) lungeDir = (nextVictimTorso.Position - vTorso.Position).unit * 80 vTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(vTorso.CFrame.p, nextVictimTorso.Position) vJumpForce.velocity = lungeDir --Vector3.new(0,10,0) --Tool.Parent.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 80 -- Let it apply a large amount of force vJumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) wait(0.6) if vJumpForce ~= nil then vJumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new() end wait(0.25) end
else lungeDir = vTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 80 vJumpForce.velocity = lungeDir --Vector3.new(0,10,0) --Tool.Parent.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 80 -- Let it apply a large amount of force vJumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000000, 1000000) wait(1.0) if vJumpForce ~= nil then vJumpForce.maxForce = Vector3.new() end wait(.2) end
wait(.2) swordUp()
damage = slash_damage Tool:FindFirstChild('Lunging').Value = false end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) if leftSwordWeld then --leftSwordWeld.C1 = leftSwordWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(180, 0, 0) -- CFrame for pointing the sword down leftSwordWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) end end
function bothSwordsDown() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) if leftSwordWeld then --leftSwordWeld.C1 = leftSwordWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(180, 0, 0) -- CFrame for pointing the sword down leftSwordWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, -1, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0) end end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,-1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) end
function swordAcross() -- parry end
function findNearestPlayer() local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local players = game.Players:GetChildren() local maxDistance = 100 local neareastDist = maxDistance local nearestCharacter = nil if #players > 1 then for i = 1, #players do local currPlayer = players[i] if currPlayer ~= vPlayer then local tempChar = players[i].Character if tempChar then local tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso then local distance = (tempTorso.Position - vTorso.Position).magnitude print('distance is' .. distance) if distance < maxDistance then --and distance < nearestDist then
nearestDist = distance neareastCharacter = tempChar print('nearestPlayer is' .. neareastCharacter.Name) return Vector3.new(tempTorso.Position.x, tempTorso.Position.y, tempTorso.Position.z) end end end end end end return nearestCharacter end
Tool.Enabled = true local last_attack = 0 function onActivated() --[[ if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false ]] local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
-- Pull out the swords on first use if Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped').Value then wait(0.3)
--wait(0.1) local rightHandWeld = vCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm'):FindFirstChild('RightGrip') -- These numbers grip to the hand rightHandWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) rightHandWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) rightHandWeld.Part0 = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") rightHandWeld.Part1 = sword --wait(0.1) if not Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm"):FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") then -- These numbers grip to the hand leftSwordWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) leftSwordWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) leftSwordWeld.Name = 'LeftGrip' leftSwordWeld.Parent = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") leftSwordWeld.Part0 = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") leftSwordWeld.Part1 = leftSword end
return end
print('Attacking') t = r.Stepped:wait()
if (t - last_attack < 0.2) then lastHitTarget = nil lunge() else attack() end
last_attack = t
--wait(.5)
--Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() --print('onEquip Called') UnsheathSound:play() lunging = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") bodyGyro = vTorso:FindFirstChild('BodyGyro') if not bodyGyro then bodyGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro', vTorso) bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(50000000, 0, 50000000) end vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vLeftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if vTorso and vLeftArm and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("LeftSword") == nil and leftSwordWeld == nil then leftSword = sword:Clone() leftSword.Name = "LeftSword" leftSword.Parent = vCharacter leftSwordWeld = Instance.new("Weld") leftSwordWeld.Part0 = vTorso leftSwordWeld.Part1 = leftSword -- This CFrame grips the sword to the back at a 45 degree angle leftSwordWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(-0.4, 0.45, 0.65) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi / 2, math.pi / 6, math.pi) leftSwordWeld.Parent = vTorso leftSwordWeld.Name = "LeftGrip"
leftSwordConnection = leftSword.Touched:connect(blow) end --wait(0.1) -- Set the Right Weapon to weld on the back local rightWeld = vCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm'):FindFirstChild('RightGrip') rightWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() rightWeld.Part0 = vTorso -- This CFrame grips the sword to the back at a 45 degree angle rightWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0.4, 0.45, 0.65) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi / 2, -math.pi / 6, 0) rightWeld.Part1 = sword
end
function onUnequipped() -- RightGrip is remove automagically, but we have to remember to clean -- the left sword and grip that we added if leftSword then leftSword:Remove() leftSword = nil end if leftSwordWeld then leftSwordWeld:Remove() leftSwordWeld = nil end if vJumpForce then vJumpForce:Remove() vJumpForce = nil end bodyGyro = vTorso:FindFirstChild('BodyGyro') if bodyGyro then bodyGyro:Remove() bodyGyro = nil end --if slashSound then slashSound:Stop() end end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" --mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) slamDown(mouse, key) end) end

local Tool = script.Parent
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local leftSwordWeld
local UnsheathAnim local holdAnim local slamAnim local thrustAnim local attackAnim
local runService = game:service("RunService") local last_attack
local animating = false
local justEquipped = Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped')
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = myTorso SlashSound.Volume = .7
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Wave_Part = Instance.new("Part") Wave_Part.FormFactor = 3 Wave_Part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 0.2, 4)
local Top_Decal = Instance.new("Decal") Top_Decal.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83658504" Top_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part Top_Decal.Face = "Top"
local Bottom_Decal = Top_Decal:Clone() Bottom_Decal.Face = "Bottom" Bottom_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part
local onSpecialCooldown = false
local function waveHit(hit, wp) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then print('Hit something') humanoid:TakeDamage(45) wp:Destroy() end end end
local function releaseTheShockWave(position) local wp = Wave_Part:Clone() wp.CFrame = CFrame.new(position, position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2) wp.Transparency = 1.0 wp.CanCollide = false --wp.Anchored = true
local float_BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") float_BodyForce.Name = "Float" float_BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.1 * wp:GetMass(), 0) float_BodyForce.Parent = wp
wp.Parent = game.Workspace
wp.Velocity = wp.CFrame.lookVector * 40.0 wp.Touched:connect(function(hit) waveHit(hit, wp) end)
RBX_Debris:AddItem(wp, 2.5) end
function swordUp() leftSwordWeld = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm"):FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) if leftSwordWeld then --leftSwordWeld.C1 = leftSwordWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(180, 0, 0) -- CFrame for pointing the sword down leftSwordWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) end end
function bothSwordsDown() leftSwordWeld = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm"):FindFirstChild("LeftGrip") Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) if leftSwordWeld then --leftSwordWeld.C1 = leftSwordWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(180, 0, 0) -- CFrame for pointing the sword down leftSwordWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2.1, 0, 0, 1, -1, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0) end end
function slamDown(key) if not onSpecialCooldown and not Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped').Value and key:lower() == "x" then onSpecialCooldown = true print("Preparing to Slam!") if thrustAnim then thrustAnim:Stop() end if SlashSound then SlashSound:Play() end bothSwordsDown() wait() slamAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlamAnim) if slamAnim then slamAnim:Play() end
wait(0.5) local rightarmPos = vCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm').Position releaseTheShockWave(rightarmPos) local leftarmPos = vCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Arm').Position releaseTheShockWave(leftarmPos) wait(2.0) swordUp() -- weapon cooldown wait(15) onSpecialCooldown = false end end
function blow(hit) end
function lunge() if not thrustAnim then thrustAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ThrustAnim) thrustAnim:AdjustSpeed(0.65) end if thrustAnim then thrustAnim:Play() end repeat wait() until not Tool:FindFirstChild('Lunging').Value if thrustAnim then thrustAnim:Stop() end end
function attack() if not attackAnim then attackAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.AttackAnim) end if attackAnim then attackAnim:Play() end end
local last_attack = 0 function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false if thrustAnim then thrustAnim:Stop() end if Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped').Value then UnsheathAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.UnsheathAnim) if UnsheathAnim then UnsheathAnim:Play() end holdAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() end wait(1.5) Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped').Value = false else
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - last_attack < 0.2) then lunge() else attack() end
last_attack = t --wait(1.0) end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) Tool.Enabled = true Tool:FindFirstChild('JustEquipped').Value = true if mouse then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") mouse.KeyDown:connect(slamDown) --[[wait(1.0) holdAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() end ]] end end
function onUnequipped() if holdAnim then print("Stopping hold Anim") holdAnim:Stop() holdAnim:Remove() end if UnsheathAnim then UnsheathAnim:Stop() end if thrustAnim then thrustAnim:Stop() end if attackAnim then attackAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Tool.Handle.Touched:connect(blow)
